headline: Vistra (VST) Revises Credit Agreements, Expands Receivables Facility to $1.1B
summary: Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) is placed 7th on our list of the best stocks to buy. Vistra announced that its subsidiaries have updated two important financing agreements, according to a recent SEC filing. On July 11, three of Vistra’s subsidiaries, TXU Energy Retail Company, TXU Energy Receivables Company, and Vistra Operations Company, updated their Receivables Purchase […]

headline: Vistra Corp (VST) Impressive EBITDA and Growing Portfolio Attracts Bullish Ratings
summary: Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) is one of the green energy stocks with long-term upside potential. The stock has rallied by more than 26% year to date, outperforming the overall market, attributed to a robust and diverse power generation portfolio. Additionally, the company has delivered solid earnings, characterized by an EBITDA of $1.35 billion in the second […]

headline: How Is Constellation Energy Accelerating Growth Through PPAs?
summary: CEG focuses on power purchase agreements to support its objective of providing carbon-free energy.
